select t1.*, t2.u_name as createUserName from log_info t1 join t_user t2 on t1.create_user = t2.u_id
1=1
and t2.u_name like concat('%',#{functionLogRequest.name},'%')
and action =#{functionLogRequest.action}
and action not in("登录","注销")
and t1.create_time >= concat(#{functionLogRequest.beginDate},' 00:00:00')
and t1.create_time <= concat(#{functionLogRequest.endDate},' 23:59:59')
order by create_time desc
